customerReviewTitles: Durable, Fun for Older Children & Fan of the Game
Great gift for a 7-year-old who loves Among Us
Great Among Us toy and collectible!
customerReviewBodies:
This Among Us Airship toy is a great size for collectors of the figurines, fans of the game and older children who may play the game but still engage in imaginative play. The ship itself is very durable and interactive; it arrives with a foam inside that holds all three figurines that arrive with the set. This foam can be removed of maintained as a display piece, as the other side of the ship has the Among Us logo on it. The features of the airship have been carefully detailed, with the front of the ship is painted in a displayable fashion. The propellers also can be moved and add to interactive play.

The figurines are the same, high-quality plastic, made for both play and display, and have details added that imitate the looks in game. Even the eyepieces on the figurines have been painted to carefully resemble the Among Us characters in game. They are the same height and shape as other collectors‚Äô figurines, so they can be compatible with the surprise figures from a previous collection.

This ship and crewmates airship set would make a fantastic gift for any fan of the game. It is a quality set that is both interactive and displays well. It compliments an established Among Us figure collection but also serves as a starting point for those who want to start collecting. I would definitely recommend it.
P

The Among us game has become a massive Internet success. My kids love it, and I'm happy to see there are now toys and other products based off the hit game. This toy is a representation of a hover-capable aircraft (like a harrier). This is accomplished/simulated by the engines on the airship rotating from horizontal to parallel.
Inside the airship there is a foam insert containing small cut-outs for the three included characters.
Fun toy for my sons (age 7 and 9). 5-stars!

I got this Among US toy for my son for his birthday and he loves it. He is a huge fan of the game and I knew this toy would be perfect for him. It comes with the aircraft, which can be played with and used as a carrier, and three figurines. It's well made and nice quality. This would be a great toy for any kid who loves Among Us or it could be a collector item. Either way it's awesome and I would recommend it. My son has played with it a lot and has so much fun with it.

My 7-year-old son is obsessed with Among Us and absolutely loves this toy. There is no assembly required. There is black foam inside the ship which can hold the 3 Among Us figures and you can also remove the black foam. My son leaves the black foam in so the figures don't roll around the ship. It would have been nice if the hats could be removed and interchanged between figures.

The ship isn't hinged so you can't just open and close it. It comes apart from the bottom. This irritates the 4 yr old for some reason lol. He wants to be able to just open and close it, like a hinged lid. He thought he broke it. But ita just that while there is a latch on one side to help keep it closed, there is no hinged to keep it attached to the other half. There are 2 little magnets to help hold it together, but they really don't do much. The little snap latch is what mainly holds it together, but the magnet side can still come open. And if you try to open the magnet side while leaving the latch side latched, the latch just comes open anyway. So the product picture up there where it looks like it is setting open with the top part up, is very misleading because you can't do that.

So basically it is more of a case to hold the 3 figures, but is also playable. He still likes it, regardless. He loves Among Us. Been playing it since he was very young, surprisingly. This little guy is a whiz at games somehow. It is mindblowing for his age. He is crazy good at all the Mario games. But that's irrelevant and I'm babbling now.

This set is good as a collector item or an actual toy for play.

The characters are solid.

Set seems to be well made, yet slightly overpriced for what it is, but that is typical with this type of stuff.

The ship is not the hard clanky plastic. A little softer, more durable.

All in all, not bad. Kid loves it. I just wish they opted for a more secure way to open and close the ship and not have to just take it apart into 2 pieces.

One figure is outside of the ship attached to the box and the remaining 2 are inside the ship, nestled in a foam insert. Hope to see more items we can add to his ever growing collection.
My son loves playing the Among Us game. This is a great toy for fans of the game! Very nice and high quality! Highly recommended!!

My 10-year-old was pretty excited about this, but he only spent maybe 10 minutes playing with it, then he just put them on his display shelf.

The ship is basically just a case to hold the little guys. They're made well enough, given that the game itself has cheesy low-budget graphics.

My kid likes it well enough, but I would say this definitely isn't worth $40. Maybe $15.

I‚Äôll admit I didn‚Äôt read any reviews, I didn‚Äôt read about their size, and I don‚Äôt think I even looked at the rating - I just bought them. My two boys play pretend Among Us all the time so I thought ‚Äòlet‚Äôs get some figurines.‚Äô To my happy surprise it came with a bag to keep the toys in, their innards, hats, and bodies are interchangeable (which is a total plus), and it came with stickers. What kid doesn‚Äôt love stickers?! Another bonus, they aren‚Äôt itty bitty and they‚Äôre made of durable thick plastic/rubber substance, which means they won‚Äôt crack down the sides like an Easter egg or bend in half like a McDonald‚Äôs toy. ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

A little long, but bear with me. So, since my child has been in elementary school I've given gift bags to the class and/or for the birthday party (usually very small and just close friends, so in no way birthdayzilla). So, this year I chose Among us, since during lockdown that became a favorite. But as with any parent who they thinks they know what their kid likes, only to find out that was so last week, I was worried because now Friday Night Funkin has been the flavor of the month, with next to no gift opportunities for parties, birthdays, or basically anything (and believe me I tried!). However, with a pandemic still bumbling along, I arranged with my youngster to have a party somewhere outdoors when it gets warmer...or so I thought. Young one informed me that they told all their friends about the party on Saturday (this was Wednesday) so I started scrambling. Well, it turned out the mouse house their heart was set on would enforce a full vaccination mandate for 5-11 on the day the party would happen. Try as I might, no vaccines before then, so I had to inform my beloved that the party would have to wait. Much disappointment! And I get it. My child really doesn't ask for much and weathered isolation as an only like a, very lonely, trooper. So, I really wanted to do something special at home to make up for it. So, the family decided on a video game treasure hunt for presents, with an Among us theme (since no FNF). So I searched frantically for decorations, and since we don't like balloons and stuff, choices were limited. I opted for a table cloth, a huge sign, and these figures of Among us characters around the table in all forms of Among us chaos (if you've played the game you know what I mean). Well, I was worried about timing, but they came when they said they would. They are about 2.5 inches tall, well made and open up to a little bone for when they are eliminated. I had fun decorating with that, lol. One was reading a book (a present), a few were in conversations, a couple eliminated...It looked great! I ended up not needing 24, but no worries because they became party favors for when the birthday party actually happened. They are good quality, larger than expected and didn't smell bad (you know what I mean). So these are great! Like really saved a hohum idea and made it more special.
Now, just a few notes. They all come separately wrapped in plastic little baggies, which might be a deal breaker for you. Also, the 24 pieces were 2 x the 12, which was not an issue for us but may be for you. Finally, if you want the figurines, make sure that's what you order and not the candles. Ours came with a small backpack that I store them in. All on all, my tween played with them and thought they were really cool, so if your child is younger it would be an even bigger hit. I definitely recommend them if you have an Among us fan in the house (and even the adults were impressed, so I actually mean it). I don't write reviews often, but these figurines were worth my time. Hope this helps!

I bought these for my Among Us obsessed child. He absolutely loves them! They seem well-made and they are a good size, not teeny-tiny & fit nicely in your hand. The pieces are all sturdy and it doesn't seem like anything will break. The hats and 'guts' are all interchangeable. Overall I am pleased with the quality and value. My kid has been playing with these toys instead of the video game all afternoon so I am very happy with my purchase!

customerReviewTitles: Great tablet at a great price
customerReviewBodies:
I bought this item to help me in my small business. Now, I realize that it's not just helping me in business concerns, it's become a third hand of sorts for my whole life. I can track everything - perhaps not a revolutionary idea these days. But for me, this is the first touch-screen "smart" device I've ever owned. I've had to learn a lot, but this device made that process much easier. Some devices (or their designers) seem to think that you should have a degree in rocket science to understand and use their tech; Samsung wants people to be able to integrate the device into what they do so that they don't have to THINK about it, just use it, as effortlessly as they do a regular notepad and pen or any other tool.

And that is what this is for me now. An invaluable tool.

Though I did break down and put one or two games on it. :P

Love this tablet! I have had it for about a month now and am very happy with it. I have had samsung galaxy phones for the past few years and am always happy with them, this is no different. I like that i can have access to any android app I want and they run nicely on it. The screen size is perfect for reading, exploring apps, etc. The speakers are much louder than I anticipated. I plugged a bluetooth speaker into it to play music outside, but the tablet's speakers were twice as loud as my speaker was! If you want a tablet with a decent camera, this is not it. I use it every once in a while for snapchat, but it isn't even good enough for that. Overall, the quality is great and can't beat the value for the price!

This is my 3rd Samsung Tab 4 10.1 I love it. But it is not long lasting as the tablet sides start separating and light shines thru
the sides. 3 1/2 yrs first time 2yrs. next. Now this new tablet is a newer and slightly different. This one has just WIFI no 4G Lte.
The settings are a little different but just the way they are setup. So basically this is the same great tablet I love. Maybe this one
will stay longer.

Great little tablet and as good as new, only much cheaper! It was originally an AT&T version and asked for a sim card when booting up but it was easy to ignore the notice and keep going if you don't want to add a sim card to make calls. AT&T customers can add a sim card for almost nothing, make calls from it and use data when away from wifi.

Bought this to replace a tablet that had died. First we bought a new tablet of a different model because a new replacement was not available. After 5 days,and tech help,we gave up and returned it. Then we purchased this used tablet and are very pleased. It did not come with instructions, but we were able to set it up in a few hours. Would have been nice if it had come with a charger.

Clear display, responds quickly. Bought as gift for my daughter, so I didn't want to put as much money into a tablet as I would for myself. Works just as well as my Samsung tablet that I purchased new for over $600. Very pleased and will be purchasing another for myself since my son shattered the screen on mine ü§¶‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 is the perfect sized tablet for lounging in bed & reading a book, playing games, watching movies, just checking email etc. I love the option of adding a micro SD card to increase storage space when needed. The android OS is perfect & has all my favorite apps! I would highly recommend the Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 for anyone looking for a perfectly sized tablet that's reasonably priced with all of the great features one would want from a tablet.
